程序包 models.game

  • 接口概要 
    接口 说明
    Strategy
    interface Strategy implements the different player behaviors using the Strategy pattern
  • 类概要 
    类 说明
    Aggressive
    this class implements Strategy interface for Aggressive behavior
    Army
    The Class Army.
    Benevolent
    this class implements Strategy interface for Benevolent behavior
    Card
    The Class Card.
    Cheater
    this class implements Strategy interface for Cheater behavior
    Dice
    The Class Dice.
    GameState
    class GameState to store and pass the current state of the game
    Human
    this class implements Strategy interface for Human behavior
    Player
    The Class Player. after a player was created , actions of assign and remove all the countries, all the cards, all the armies to the player is possible to do.
    Random
    this class implements Strategy interface for Random behavior
    Tournament  
  • 枚举概要 
    枚举 说明

    GameState.Phase
